languages.text: "Я сочла важным сообщить эти данные лично. Возможно, вы изъявите желание посетить указанное место".
"I deemed it necessary to relay the information in person in case you wish to visit this place."
languages.original_text: "Я сочла важным сообщить эти данные лично. Возможно, вы изъявите желание посетить указанное место".

traits.locale_text: "I deemed it necessary to relay the information in person in case you wish to visit this place."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "I deemed it necessary to relay the information in person in case you wish to visit this place."

languages.text: « J'ai jugé bon de vous transmettre l'information en personne, au cas où vous souhaiteriez vous rendre sur les lieux. »
languages.original_text: "I deemed it necessary to relay the information in person in case you wish to visit this place."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai jugé bon de vous transmettre l'information en personne, au cas où vous souhaiteriez vous rendre sur les lieux. »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “我认为有必要亲自转达这些信息，您或许打算看看发生了什么事情。”
languages.original_text: "I deemed it necessary to relay the information in person in case you wish to visit this place."

traits.locale_text: “我认为有必要亲自转达这些信息，您或许打算看看发生了什么事情。”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Ich wollte Euch diese Informationen persönlich übermitteln, falls Ihr den Ort des Geschehens besuchen wollt."
languages.original_text: "I deemed it necessary to relay the information in person in case you wish to visit this place."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wollte Euch diese Informationen persönlich übermitteln, falls Ihr den Ort des Geschehens besuchen wollt."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Me pareció necesario decírselo en persona por si quisiera visitar dicho lugar».
languages.original_text: "I deemed it necessary to relay the information in person in case you wish to visit this place."

traits.locale_text: «Me pareció necesario decírselo en persona por si quisiera visitar dicho lugar».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「陛下がこの場所を訪れるつもりならば、直接情報を伝える必要があると判断しました」
languages.original_text: "I deemed it necessary to relay the information in person in case you wish to visit this place."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下がこの場所を訪れるつもりならば、直接情報を伝える必要があると判断しました」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Konumu ziyaret etmek isteyebilirsiniz diye bu bilgiyi size bizzat iletme gerekliliği duydum."
languages.original_text: "I deemed it necessary to relay the information in person in case you wish to visit this place."
